scripts.title: 30-Day OpenClaw Challenge
scripts.hook: Day 1: Testing if OpenClaw can automate my entire workflow in 30 days
scripts.body:
Starting a 30-day experiment.

Can OpenClaw handle:
- All my daily tasks
- Business operations  
- Content creation
- Revenue tracking

If this works, I'm never going back to manual work.

Follow for daily updates.
